name: Psylocke (Elizabeth Braddock) (Earth-616)
Trivia: Though originally white and British, Psylocke's mind was transferred into the body of a Japanese ninja named Kwannon, which stirred up issues of race and identity among fans (de Guzman 2015)

name: Loki Laufeyson (Earth-616)
Artist: Penciler: Olivier Coipel, Inker: Mark Morales, Colourist: Laura Martin, Letterer: Chris Eliopoulos
Trivia: While Loki's bisexuality was confirmed by Al Ewing, writer of Loki: Agent of Asgard, there is much more conversation surrounding Loki's gender identity

name: Deadpool (Wade Wilson)
Trivia: Deadpool is famously known to break the fourth wall, and even compared his looks to that of Ryan Reynolds -- who was casted as the character -- in the comics before the movie came out (McDonald 2011)

name: Mystique (Raven Darkholme) (Earth-616)
Artist: Penciler/Inker: Ben Oliver, Colorist: Veronica Gandini, Letterer: Dave Sharpe
Trivia: Mystique raised (future X-Man) Rogue with Destiny, her female companion and lover. However, during that time, Comics Code Authority prevented depictions of queer relationships, so Mystique and Destiny were often written as friends (Cocca 2016)

name: Heather Douglas (Earth-616)
Trivia: Heather (aka 'Moondragon') is part of the Guardians of the Galaxy and has telepathic abilities that surpass those of X-Men's Professor Charles Xavier (Jacobino 2017)
